org.dmd.mvw.client.mvwcomms.extended
Class CommsController

java.lang.Object
  org.dmd.mvw.client.mvwcomms.generated.mvw.controllers.CommsControllerBaseImpl
      org.dmd.mvw.client.mvwcomms.extended.CommsController
All Implemented Interfaces:
CommsControllerIF, ResponseHandlerIF
public class CommsController
extends CommsControllerBaseImpl
implements CommsControllerIF

The CommsController provides standardized access to the Dark Matter Protocol connection to the server.

Method Detail

setControllerTracing

public void setControllerTracing(boolean f)
Sets tracing of messages through the CommsController on/off. The GWT logging level must be set to FINEST in order for the logs to be seen.

Parameters:
f - set to true if you want to see tracing of message handling through the controller.

setGlobalMessageTracking

public void setGlobalMessageTracking(boolean f)
Sets a flag that will turn global message tracking on/off.

Parameters:
f - set to true if you want all message handling tracking

getDeleteRequest

public DeleteRequestDMO getDeleteRequest()

sendDeleteRequest

public void sendDeleteRequest(DeleteRequestDMO request,
                              ResponseHandlerIF handler,
                              ErrorOptionsEnum rpc,
                              ErrorOptionsEnum dmp)
Sends a delete request and associates the specified response handler. The request is stored in our outstanding requests collection based on its unique request ID. The callback associated with the request has a handle to the response handler and indicates how RPC and Dark Matter Protocol (DMP) errors are to be handled.

Parameters:
request - the request to be sent
handler - handle to entity that will handle the response
rpc - how RPC errors should be handled
dmp - hom DMP errors should be handled

getActionRequest

public ActionRequestDMO getActionRequest(ActionTriggerInfo ati)
This method returns a new action request that has its request ID, session and action name initialized. The action name is taken from the action trigger. The actionTrigger is also set on the ActionRequest
